title: Enjoy £10 off True Wireless Earpods
content:
Sleek and stylish, compact and powerful, the ergonomically-designed True Wireless Earpods will take your experience of listening to music on the go to the next level. The lightweight and minimalistic portable charging case has an impressive power input of DC 5V, plus it has a charging time of just one hour and is capable of 400mAh of magic. Better yet, with this exclusive deal, you can buy these fantastic earpods for just £19.99 plus free delivery, instead of the usual £29.99 – that’s a saving of £10!

Get £10 off now

Note: We negotiate hard to bring you great offers and the best prices in our online deals. We receive a commission from the retailer for each completed purchase and this income helps us to continue to be able to offer you our high-quality content free of charge.

The True Wireless Charging Cradle and Earpods are available in matt black, rose gold, silver or matt white. With this exclusive deal, you’ll receive one pair of True Wireless Earpods in the colour of your choice, a cradle, a charging cable for the cradle and a user guide.

Features of the earpods include:

  • Wireless freedom offering plug and play convenience completely cable free
  • Comes with a portable charging case – just pop the earpods in the case to charge and transport
  • Ergonomic earpods designed to stay secure as you move
  • Bluetooth V4 2+EDR- for best stereo sound and superb bass capabilities
  • Features include Play/Pause; a built-in Mic – enabling handsfree calls; Answer Calls/Reject incoming calls; and standard volume controls.

Offer ends 08/07/21. Cannot be used in conjunction with any other discounts or offers.

Get £10 off now

author: Steve Newell
